summary: Diff implements a text-only ForgeBrandMark component and updates major callers (GlobalHeader, HeroSection, ForgeHomePage) to use it; favicon reference appears removed from frontend/index.html. However, the diff does not provide evidence that all other user-visible branding surfaces (e.g., footer brand lockups, loading/empty states) have been audited/updated to prevent any remaining icon-mark rendering. Additionally, project/state and summary files describe broader non-branding changes (routing/pages/UX updates) that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Forge icon mark from all user-visible UI surfaces and enforce a permanent text-only brand presentation that displays exactly “Forge AI” everywhere branding appears (header, homepage hero branding, any other brand lockups, and any loading/empty states that currently show a logo).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows text-only branding updates in header and homepage hero areas, but provides no evidence that other potential brand lockups (e.g., footer, loading/empty states, other pages) were checked/updated to remove the icon mark across the entire app and prevent regressions on route navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader homepage/content redesign beyond removing the icon mark (conversion-focused narrative arc, additional sections, CTA/IA changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is branding-only; the modified project state/summary content describes substantial homepage restructuring and copy/IA changes beyond what is necessary to remove icon branding.

hallucinated_features.description: New or expanded routing/pages (e.g., adding a /demo-lab route and other top-level pages like Explore/Marketplace/Docs/Build).
hallucinated_features.reason: Routing changes are explicitly called out as a non-goal unless necessary for icon removal; the diff summary text describes routing additions unrelated to branding removal.

hallucinated_features.description: Non-branding functional/UX changes to multiple components (ExecutionPanel orchestration changes, ActivityFeed behavior, RatingStars behavior, RoadmapTimeline interactivity updates, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are outside the branding-only scope; they are described as implemented updates in the file summaries/project state without any requirement requesting them.
